item.title: Piero Martinello’s new work for Benetton
item.description: Is good to hear good news from our clients. Some months ago we worked for Piero Martinello, a young Italian supertalented photographer. We took care of his website portfolio and pdf portfolio. Piero, after working extensively for Colors Magazine and different Social campaigns, has just taken this pictures in Paris for the International Benetton Campaign: [...]
item.content:encoded:
Is good to hear good news from our clients. Some months ago we worked for Piero Martinello, a young Italian supertalented photographer. We took care of his website portfolio and pdf portfolio.

Piero, after working extensively for Colors Magazine and different Social campaigns, has just taken this pictures in Paris for the International Benetton Campaign: It’s My time. Good job Piero.
